name: Give a Hand
description:
A game made live on Twitch in around 8 hours, for the Trijam#116.
Obviously I took wayyyyyy too much time so I did not submit the game.

Play with your mouse

  • Left click to grab
  • Right click to stop people from going crazy in every direction

Made by

  • Géraud Zucchini (game)
  • Antoine Druaux (music)

Inspired by the amazing work of Arlin Smiles
